entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of snow or ice pellets beginning early this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:03 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain this evening and after midnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 06:03 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
